data.comment: The match is underway in Sinsheim.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Dortmund's half.
In the minute 2, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Dortmund to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 4, In Sinsheim Hoffenheim attack through Mijat Gacinovic. The finish is off target, however.
Sascha Stegemann awards Dortmund a goal kick.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 5, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Dortmund's Giovanni Reyna gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hoffenheim defender.
In the minute 8, Jadon Sancho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Dortmund.
Throw-in for Dortmund in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Dortmund.
Free kick Dortmund.
The match at PreZero Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Lukasz Piszczek, who is down injured.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Mijat Gacinovic for Hoffenheim drives towards goal at PreZero Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Thomas Delaney is on a sub for Lukasz Piszczek for Dortmund.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Dortmund.
Ball goes out of play for a Dortmund goal kick.
Felix Passlack (Dortmund) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 26, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dortmund are in shooting range from this free kick.
Dortmund are whistled for offside.
In the minute 30, Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dortmund's half?
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 32, Sebastian Rudy (Hoffenheim) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Hoffenheim.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Dortmund throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
In the minute 33, Dortmund are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Dortmund at PreZero Arena.
Giovanni Reyna (Dortmund) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Dortmund to take a throw-in in Hoffenheim territory.
Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Thomas Meunier (Dortmund) gets in a header but the ball hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Hoffenheim are pushing forward but Sebastian Rudy's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Dortmund at PreZero Arena.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dortmund awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Sinsheim.
Sascha Stegemann has blown to start the second-half.
Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Sascha Stegemann awards the away team a throw-in.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Dortmund.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Dortmund at PreZero Arena.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Dortmund's half.
Dortmund's Giovanni Reyna gets in a shot on goal at PreZero Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
At PreZero Arena, Dortmund are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Dortmund in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 55, Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Dortmund in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann signals a Dortmund throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 58, Hoffenheim will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Dortmund.
Hoffenheim's Stefan Posch has been booked in Sinsheim.
Can Dortmund get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
In the minute 59, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Dortmund territory.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Sinsheim.
Hoffenheim make their first substitution with Christoph Baumgartner replacing Ishak Belfodil.
In the minute 60, Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's second substitution at PreZero Arena with Jacob Bruun Larsen replacing Mijat Gacinovic.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
The away team replace Jadon Sancho with Marco Reus.
In the minute 64, Erling Haaland is replacing Julian Brandt for the away team.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Dortmund awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Hoffenheim capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 71, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sebastian Rudy for Hoffenheim who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ball safe as Dortmund is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Dortmund close to the penalty box.
Sascha Stegemann signals a throw-in for Dortmund, close to Hoffenheim's area.
In the minute 74, Hoffenheimâ€™s Sebastian Rudy is on his feet again at PreZero Arena.
Dortmund drives forward and Marco Reus gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 75, Jude Bellingham is replacing Mahmoud Dahoud for Dortmund at PreZero Arena.
The away team replace Thomas Meunier with Raphael Guerreiro.
Goal! Marco Reus gives Dortmund a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 76, Great play from Erling Haaland to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Dortmund at PreZero Arena.
Erling Haaland of Dortmund gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Hoffenheim goal kick.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) is making a third substitution, with Munas Dabbur replacing Ihlas Bebou.
In Sinsheim a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The home team have replaced Robert Skov with Ryan Sessegnon. This is the fourth substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
In the minute 80, The home team have replaced Stefan Posch with Florian Grillitsch. This is the fifth substitution made today by Sebastian Hoeness.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, In Sinsheim Hoffenheim drive forward through Christoph Baumgartner. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Erling Haaland for Dortmund gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Dortmund in their own half.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
Sascha Stegemann awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Dortmund's Giovanni Reyna gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sinsheim.
Sascha Stegemann awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Dortmund.
Throw-in for Dortmund at PreZero Arena.
In the minute 89, Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Dortmund have been awarded a corner by Sascha Stegemann.
Dortmund are coming forward and Marco Reus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Hoffenheim at PreZero Arena.
Sascha Stegemann signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Hoffenheim!
Hoffenheim's Christoph Baumgartner attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Sascha Stegemann awards Dortmund a goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Hoffenheim's Diadie Samassekou breaks free at PreZero Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Dortmund have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
Giovanni Reyna (Dortmund) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
